00034 //******************************* Interpolation *******************************/
00035 
00036 void interp_v2_v2v2(float target[2], const float a[2], const float b[2], const float t)
00037 {
00038     float s = 1.0f - t;
00039 
00040     target[0] = s * a[0] + t * b[0];
00041     target[1] = s * a[1] + t * b[1];
00042 }
00043 
00044 /* weight 3 2D vectors,
00045  * 'w' must be unit length but is not a vector, just 3 weights */
00046 void interp_v2_v2v2v2(float p[2], const float v1[2], const float v2[2], const float v3[2], const float w[3])
00047 {
00048     p[0] = v1[0] * w[0] + v2[0] * w[1] + v3[0] * w[2];
00049     p[1] = v1[1] * w[0] + v2[1] * w[1] + v3[1] * w[2];
00050 }
00051 
00052 void interp_v3_v3v3(float target[3], const float a[3], const float b[3], const float t)
00053 {
00054     float s = 1.0f - t;
00055 
00056     target[0] = s * a[0] + t * b[0];
00057     target[1] = s * a[1] + t * b[1];
00058     target[2] = s * a[2] + t * b[2];
00059 }
00060 
00061 void interp_v4_v4v4(float target[4], const float a[4], const float b[4], const float t)
00062 {
00063     float s = 1.0f - t;
00064 
00065     target[0] = s * a[0] + t * b[0];
00066     target[1] = s * a[1] + t * b[1];
00067     target[2] = s * a[2] + t * b[2];
00068     target[3] = s * a[3] + t * b[3];
00069 }
00070 
00071 /* weight 3 vectors,
00072  * 'w' must be unit length but is not a vector, just 3 weights */
00073 void interp_v3_v3v3v3(float p[3], const float v1[3], const float v2[3], const float v3[3], const float w[3])
00074 {
00075     p[0] = v1[0] * w[0] + v2[0] * w[1] + v3[0] * w[2];
00076     p[1] = v1[1] * w[0] + v2[1] * w[1] + v3[1] * w[2];
00077     p[2] = v1[2] * w[0] + v2[2] * w[1] + v3[2] * w[2];
00078 }
00079 
00080 /* weight 3 vectors,
00081  * 'w' must be unit length but is not a vector, just 4 weights */
00082 void interp_v3_v3v3v3v3(float p[3], const float v1[3], const float v2[3], const float v3[3], const float v4[3], const float w[4])
00083 {
00084     p[0] = v1[0] * w[0] + v2[0] * w[1] + v3[0] * w[2] + v4[0] * w[3];
00085     p[1] = v1[1] * w[0] + v2[1] * w[1] + v3[1] * w[2] + v4[1] * w[3];
00086     p[2] = v1[2] * w[0] + v2[2] * w[1] + v3[2] * w[2] + v4[2] * w[3];
00087 }
00088 
00089 void interp_v4_v4v4v4(float p[4], const float v1[4], const float v2[4], const float v3[4], const float w[3])
00090 {
00091     p[0] = v1[0] * w[0] + v2[0] * w[1] + v3[0] * w[2];
00092     p[1] = v1[1] * w[0] + v2[1] * w[1] + v3[1] * w[2];
00093     p[2] = v1[2] * w[0] + v2[2] * w[1] + v3[2] * w[2];
00094     p[3] = v1[3] * w[0] + v2[3] * w[1] + v3[3] * w[2];
00095 }
00096 
00097 void interp_v4_v4v4v4v4(float p[4], const float v1[4], const float v2[4], const float v3[4], const float v4[4], const float w[4])
00098 {
00099     p[0] = v1[0] * w[0] + v2[0] * w[1] + v3[0] * w[2] + v4[0] * w[3];
00100     p[1] = v1[1] * w[0] + v2[1] * w[1] + v3[1] * w[2] + v4[1] * w[3];
00101     p[2] = v1[2] * w[0] + v2[2] * w[1] + v3[2] * w[2] + v4[2] * w[3];
00102     p[3] = v1[3] * w[0] + v2[3] * w[1] + v3[3] * w[2] + v4[3] * w[3];
00103 }
00104 
00105 void mid_v3_v3v3(float v[3], const float v1[3], const float v2[3])
00106 {
00107     v[0] = 0.5f * (v1[0] + v2[0]);
00108     v[1] = 0.5f * (v1[1] + v2[1]);
00109     v[2] = 0.5f * (v1[2] + v2[2]);
00110 }
00111 
00112 void mid_v2_v2v2(float v[2], const float v1[2], const float v2[2])
00113 {
00114     v[0] = 0.5f * (v1[0] + v2[0]);
00115     v[1] = 0.5f * (v1[1] + v2[1]);
00116 }
00117 
00118 /********************************** Angles ***********************************/
00119 
00120 /* Return the angle in radians between vecs 1-2 and 2-3 in radians
00121  * If v1 is a shoulder, v2 is the elbow and v3 is the hand,
00122  * this would return the angle at the elbow.
00123  *
00124  * note that when v1/v2/v3 represent 3 points along a straight line
00125  * that the angle returned will be pi (180deg), rather then 0.0
00126  */
00127 float angle_v3v3v3(const float v1[3], const float v2[3], const float v3[3])
00128 {
00129     float vec1[3], vec2[3];
00130 
00131     sub_v3_v3v3(vec1, v2, v1);
00132     sub_v3_v3v3(vec2, v2, v3);
00133     normalize_v3(vec1);
00134     normalize_v3(vec2);
00135 
00136     return angle_normalized_v3v3(vec1, vec2);
00137 }
00138 
00139 /* Return the shortest angle in radians between the 2 vectors */
00140 float angle_v3v3(const float v1[3], const float v2[3])
00141 {
00142     float vec1[3], vec2[3];
00143 
00144     normalize_v3_v3(vec1, v1);
00145     normalize_v3_v3(vec2, v2);
00146 
00147     return angle_normalized_v3v3(vec1, vec2);
00148 }
00149 
00150 float angle_v2v2v2(const float v1[2], const float v2[2], const float v3[2])
00151 {
00152     float vec1[2], vec2[2];
00153 
00154     vec1[0] = v2[0] - v1[0];
00155     vec1[1] = v2[1] - v1[1];
00156 
00157     vec2[0] = v2[0] - v3[0];
00158     vec2[1] = v2[1] - v3[1];
00159 
00160     normalize_v2(vec1);
00161     normalize_v2(vec2);
00162 
00163     return angle_normalized_v2v2(vec1, vec2);
00164 }
00165 
00166 /* Return the shortest angle in radians between the 2 vectors */
00167 float angle_v2v2(const float v1[2], const float v2[2])
00168 {
00169     float vec1[2], vec2[2];
00170 
00171     vec1[0] = v1[0];
00172     vec1[1] = v1[1];
00173 
00174     vec2[0] = v2[0];
00175     vec2[1] = v2[1];
00176 
00177     normalize_v2(vec1);
00178     normalize_v2(vec2);
00179 
00180     return angle_normalized_v2v2(vec1, vec2);
00181 }
00182 
00183 float angle_signed_v2v2(const float v1[2], const float v2[2])
00184 {
00185     const float perp_dot = (v1[1] * v2[0]) - (v1[0] * v2[1]);
00186     return atan2f(perp_dot, dot_v2v2(v1, v2));
00187 }
00188 
00189 float angle_normalized_v3v3(const float v1[3], const float v2[3])
00190 {
00191     /* this is the same as acos(dot_v3v3(v1, v2)), but more accurate */
00192     if (dot_v3v3(v1, v2) < 0.0f) {
00193         float vec[3];
00194 
00195         vec[0] = -v2[0];
00196         vec[1] = -v2[1];
00197         vec[2] = -v2[2];
00198 
00199         return (float)M_PI - 2.0f * (float)saasin(len_v3v3(vec, v1) / 2.0f);
00200     }
00201     else
00202         return 2.0f * (float)saasin(len_v3v3(v2, v1) / 2.0f);
00203 }
00204 
00205 float angle_normalized_v2v2(const float v1[2], const float v2[2])
00206 {
00207     /* this is the same as acos(dot_v3v3(v1, v2)), but more accurate */
00208     if (dot_v2v2(v1, v2) < 0.0f) {
00209         float vec[2];
00210 
00211         vec[0] = -v2[0];
00212         vec[1] = -v2[1];
00213 
00214         return (float)M_PI - 2.0f * saasin(len_v2v2(vec, v1) / 2.0f);
00215     }
00216     else
00217         return 2.0f * (float)saasin(len_v2v2(v2, v1) / 2.0f);
00218 }
00219 
00220 void angle_tri_v3(float angles[3], const float v1[3], const float v2[3], const float v3[3])
00221 {
00222     float ed1[3], ed2[3], ed3[3];
00223 
00224     sub_v3_v3v3(ed1, v3, v1);
00225     sub_v3_v3v3(ed2, v1, v2);
00226     sub_v3_v3v3(ed3, v2, v3);
00227 
00228     normalize_v3(ed1);
00229     normalize_v3(ed2);
00230     normalize_v3(ed3);
00231 
00232     angles[0] = (float)M_PI - angle_normalized_v3v3(ed1, ed2);
00233     angles[1] = (float)M_PI - angle_normalized_v3v3(ed2, ed3);
00234     // face_angles[2] = M_PI - angle_normalized_v3v3(ed3, ed1);
00235     angles[2] = (float)M_PI - (angles[0] + angles[1]);
00236 }
00237 
00238 void angle_quad_v3(float angles[4], const float v1[3], const float v2[3], const float v3[3], const float v4[3])
00239 {
00240     float ed1[3], ed2[3], ed3[3], ed4[3];
00241 
00242     sub_v3_v3v3(ed1, v4, v1);
00243     sub_v3_v3v3(ed2, v1, v2);
00244     sub_v3_v3v3(ed3, v2, v3);
00245     sub_v3_v3v3(ed4, v3, v4);
00246 
00247     normalize_v3(ed1);
00248     normalize_v3(ed2);
00249     normalize_v3(ed3);
00250     normalize_v3(ed4);
00251 
00252     angles[0] = (float)M_PI - angle_normalized_v3v3(ed1, ed2);
00253     angles[1] = (float)M_PI - angle_normalized_v3v3(ed2, ed3);
00254     angles[2] = (float)M_PI - angle_normalized_v3v3(ed3, ed4);
00255     angles[3] = (float)M_PI - angle_normalized_v3v3(ed4, ed1);
00256 }
00257 
00258 void angle_poly_v3(float *angles, const float *verts[3], int len)
00259 {
00260     int i;
00261     float vec[3][3];
00262 
00263     sub_v3_v3v3(vec[2], verts[len - 1], verts[0]);
00264     normalize_v3(vec[2]);
00265     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00266         sub_v3_v3v3(vec[i % 3], verts[i % len], verts[(i + 1) % len]);
00267         normalize_v3(vec[i % 3]);
00268         angles[i] = (float)M_PI - angle_normalized_v3v3(vec[(i + 2) % 3], vec[i % 3]);
00269     }
00270 }

00274 /* Project v1 on v2 */
00275 void project_v2_v2v2(float c[2], const float v1[2], const float v2[2])
00276 {
00277     float mul;
00278     mul = dot_v2v2(v1, v2) / dot_v2v2(v2, v2);
00279 
00280     c[0] = mul * v2[0];
00281     c[1] = mul * v2[1];
00282 }
00283 
00284 /* Project v1 on v2 */
00285 void project_v3_v3v3(float c[3], const float v1[3], const float v2[3])
00286 {
00287     float mul;
00288     mul = dot_v3v3(v1, v2) / dot_v3v3(v2, v2);
00289 
00290     c[0] = mul * v2[0];
00291     c[1] = mul * v2[1];
00292     c[2] = mul * v2[2];
00293 }
00294 
00295 /* project a vector on a plane defined by normal and a plane point p */
00296 void project_v3_plane(float v[3], const float n[3], const float p[3])
00297 {
00298     float vector[3];
00299     float mul;
00300 
00301     sub_v3_v3v3(vector, v, p);
00302     mul = dot_v3v3(vector, n) / len_squared_v3(n);
00303 
00304     mul_v3_v3fl(vector, n, mul);
00305 
00306     sub_v3_v3(v, vector);
00307 }
00308 
00309 /* Returns a vector bisecting the angle at v2 formed by v1, v2 and v3 */
00310 void bisect_v3_v3v3v3(float out[3], const float v1[3], const float v2[3], const float v3[3])
00311 {
00312     float d_12[3], d_23[3];
00313     sub_v3_v3v3(d_12, v2, v1);
00314     sub_v3_v3v3(d_23, v3, v2);
00315     normalize_v3(d_12);
00316     normalize_v3(d_23);
00317     add_v3_v3v3(out, d_12, d_23);
00318     normalize_v3(out);
00319 }
00320 
00321 /* Returns a reflection vector from a vector and a normal vector
00322  * reflect = vec - ((2 * DotVecs(vec, mirror)) * mirror)
00323  */
00324 void reflect_v3_v3v3(float out[3], const float v1[3], const float v2[3])
00325 {
00326     float vec[3], normal[3];
00327     float reflect[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00328     float dot2;
00329 
00330     copy_v3_v3(vec, v1);
00331     copy_v3_v3(normal, v2);
00332 
00333     dot2 = 2 * dot_v3v3(vec, normal);
00334 
00335     reflect[0] = vec[0] - (dot2 * normal[0]);
00336     reflect[1] = vec[1] - (dot2 * normal[1]);
00337     reflect[2] = vec[2] - (dot2 * normal[2]);
00338 
00339     copy_v3_v3(out, reflect);
00340 }
00341 
00342 void ortho_basis_v3v3_v3(float v1[3], float v2[3], const float v[3])
00343 {
00344     const float f = (float)sqrt(v[0] * v[0] + v[1] * v[1]);
00345 
00346     if (f < 1e-35f) {
00347         // degenerate case
00348         v1[0] = (v[2] < 0.0f) ? -1.0f : 1.0f;
00349         v1[1] = v1[2] = v2[0] = v2[2] = 0.0f;
00350         v2[1] = 1.0f;
00351     }
00352     else {
00353         const float d = 1.0f / f;
00354 
00355         v1[0] = v[1] * d;
00356         v1[1] = -v[0] * d;
00357         v1[2] = 0.0f;
00358         v2[0] = -v[2] * v1[1];
00359         v2[1] = v[2] * v1[0];
00360         v2[2] = v[0] * v1[1] - v[1] * v1[0];
00361     }
00362 }
00363 
00364 /* Rotate a point p by angle theta around an arbitrary axis r
00365  * http://local.wasp.uwa.edu.au/~pbourke/geometry/
00366  */
00367 void rotate_normalized_v3_v3v3fl(float r[3], const float p[3], const float axis[3], const float angle)
00368 {
00369     const float costheta = cos(angle);
00370     const float sintheta = sin(angle);
00371 
00372     r[0] = ((costheta + (1 - costheta) * axis[0] * axis[0]) * p[0]) +
00373            (((1 - costheta) * axis[0] * axis[1] - axis[2] * sintheta) * p[1]) +
00374            (((1 - costheta) * axis[0] * axis[2] + axis[1] * sintheta) * p[2]);
00375 
00376     r[1] = (((1 - costheta) * axis[0] * axis[1] + axis[2] * sintheta) * p[0]) +
00377            ((costheta + (1 - costheta) * axis[1] * axis[1]) * p[1]) +
00378            (((1 - costheta) * axis[1] * axis[2] - axis[0] * sintheta) * p[2]);
00379 
00380     r[2] = (((1 - costheta) * axis[0] * axis[2] - axis[1] * sintheta) * p[0]) +
00381            (((1 - costheta) * axis[1] * axis[2] + axis[0] * sintheta) * p[1]) +
00382            ((costheta + (1 - costheta) * axis[2] * axis[2]) * p[2]);
00383 }
00384 
00385 void rotate_v3_v3v3fl(float r[3], const float p[3], const float axis[3], const float angle)
00386 {
00387     float axis_n[3];
00388 
00389     normalize_v3_v3(axis_n, axis);
00390 
00391     rotate_normalized_v3_v3v3fl(r, p, axis_n, angle);
00392 }

00398     printf("%s: %.3f %.3f\n", str, v[0], v[1]);

00403     printf("%s: %.3f %.3f %.3f\n", str, v[0], v[1], v[2]);

00407 {
00408     printf("%s: %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f\n", str, v[0], v[1], v[2], v[3]);

00410 
00411 void minmax_v3v3_v3(float min[3], float max[3], const float vec[3])
00412 {
00413     if (min[0] > vec[0]) min[0] = vec[0];
00414     if (min[1] > vec[1]) min[1] = vec[1];
00415     if (min[2] > vec[2]) min[2] = vec[2];
00416 
00417     if (max[0] < vec[0]) max[0] = vec[0];
00418     if (max[1] < vec[1]) max[1] = vec[1];
00419     if (max[2] < vec[2]) max[2] = vec[2];
00420 }
00421 
00422 /***************************** Array Functions *******************************/
00423 
00424 double dot_vn_vn(const float *array_src_a, const float *array_src_b, const int size)
00425 {
00426     double d = 0.0f;
00427     const float *array_pt_a = array_src_a + (size - 1);
00428     const float *array_pt_b = array_src_b + (size - 1);
00429     int i = size;
00430     while (i--) {
00431         d += *(array_pt_a--) * *(array_pt_b--);
00432     }
00433     return d;
00434 }
00435 
00436 float normalize_vn_vn(float *array_tar, const float *array_src, const int size)
00437 {
00438     double d = dot_vn_vn(array_tar, array_src, size);
00439     float d_sqrt;
00440     if (d > 1.0e-35) {
00441         d_sqrt = (float)sqrt(d);
00442         mul_vn_vn_fl(array_tar, array_src, size, 1.0f / d_sqrt);
00443     }
00444     else {
00445         fill_vn_fl(array_tar, size, 0.0f);
00446         d_sqrt = 0.0f;
00447     }
00448     return d_sqrt;
00449 }
00450 
00451 float normalize_vn(float *array_tar, const int size)
00452 {
00453     return normalize_vn_vn(array_tar, array_tar, size);
00454 }
00455 
00456 void range_vn_i(int *array_tar, const int size, const int start)
00457 {
00458     int *array_pt = array_tar + (size - 1);
00459     int j = start + (size - 1);
00460     int i = size;
00461     while (i--) {
00462         *(array_pt--) = j--;
00463     }
00464 }
00465 
00466 void range_vn_fl(float *array_tar, const int size, const float start, const float step)
00467 {
00468     float *array_pt = array_tar + (size - 1);
00469     int i = size;
00470     while (i--) {
00471         *(array_pt--) = start + step * (float)(i);
00472     }
00473 }
00474 
00475 void negate_vn(float *array_tar, const int size)
00476 {
00477     float *array_pt = array_tar + (size - 1);
00478     int i = size;
00479     while (i--) {
00480         *(array_pt--) *= -1.0f;
00481     }
00482 }
00483 
00484 void negate_vn_vn(float *array_tar, const float *array_src, const int size)
00485 {
00486     float *tar = array_tar + (size - 1);
00487     const float *src = array_src + (size - 1);
00488     int i = size;
00489     while (i--) {
00490         *(tar--) = -*(src--);
00491     }
00492 }
00493 
00494 void mul_vn_fl(float *array_tar, const int size, const float f)
00495 {
00496     float *array_pt = array_tar + (size - 1);
00497     int i = size;
00498     while (i--) {
00499         *(array_pt--) *= f;
00500     }
00501 }
00502 
00503 void mul_vn_vn_fl(float *array_tar, const float *array_src, const int size, const float f)
00504 {
00505     float *tar = array_tar + (size - 1);
00506     const float *src = array_src + (size - 1);
00507     int i = size;
00508     while (i--) {
00509         *(tar--) = *(src--) * f;
00510     }
00511 }
